publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3914 Karen Whitefield: Shotts Shakers Successâ€”That the Parliament congratulates members of the Shotts Shakers cheerleading group for winning the Reclaim Cheer Cup, a competition organised by Sidekix; recognises the important role of the Getting Better Together project in supporting the group; notes that the Shotts Shakers received their trophy on 9 April 2009 from Ally McCoist at the Reclaim Award Ceremony in the Mitchell Theatre Glasgow, and recognises the success of the Sidekix programme in providing diversionary activities for young people.
